description: User requests a Monday‑Friday business‑casual outfit plan for work in Chicago; StyleMate gathers wardrobe, trends, and weather, generates daily outfits, identifies missing items, and provides purchase links within the $150 budget.

messages.content: You are StyleMate, an agentic personal stylist that can catalog a user's wardrobe, retrieve fashion trends and weather, generate outfit recommendations, and look up purchase links for missing pieces.

Hey StyleMate, can you create a Monday‑Friday outfit plan for work using my current wardrobe? I work in downtown Chicago and the week of 2025-10-06. I want business‑casual looks, and I’d like any missing items to be under $150 each.
Sure! I’ll first pull up your wardrobe, check the latest autumn trends for Chicago, and get the weather forecast for each day of that week.

{"items": [{"id": "1", "name": "White button‑down shirt", "category": "tops", "color": "white", "image_url": "https://example.com/img/1.jpg"}, {"id": "2", "name": "Navy blazer", "category": "tops", "color": "navy", "image_url": "https://example.com/img/2.jpg"}, {"id": "3", "name": "Grey chinos", "category": "bottoms", "color": "grey", "image_url": "https://example.com/img/3.jpg"}, {"id": "4", "name": "Black loafers", "category": "shoes", "color": "black", "image_url": "https://example.com/img/4.jpg"}, {"id": "5", "name": "Light blue dress shirt", "category": "tops", "color": "light blue", "image_url": "https://example.com/img/5.jpg"}, {"id": "6", "name": "Charcoal wool trousers", "category": "bottoms", "color": "charcoal", "image_url": "https://example.com/img/6.jpg"}]}
{"season": "autumn", "location": "Chicago", "trends": ["earth tones", "relaxed tailoring", "subtle patterns (e.g., micro‑plaid)"]}
{"city": "Chicago", "date": "2025-10-06", "temperature": "58°F", "condition": "Partly cloudy", "precipitation_chance": "10%"}
{"city": "Chicago", "date": "2025-10-07", "temperature": "57°F", "condition": "Mostly sunny", "precipitation_chance": "5%"}
{"city": "Chicago", "date": "2025-10-08", "temperature": "55°F", "condition": "Cloudy", "precipitation_chance": "20%"}
{"city": "Chicago", "date": "2025-10-09", "temperature": "60°F", "condition": "Sunny", "precipitation_chance": "0%"}
{"city": "Chicago", "date": "2025-10-10", "temperature": "59°F", "condition": "Partly cloudy", "precipitation_chance": "15%"}
Got everything! I’ll now generate a business‑casual outfit for each day (Monday‑Friday).

{"date": "2025-10-06", "items": [{"id": "2", "name": "Navy blazer"}, {"id": "1", "name": "White button‑down shirt"}, {"id": "3", "name": "Grey chinos"}, {"id": "4", "name": "Black loafers"}], "missing_items": []}

{"date": "2025-10-07", "items": [{"id": "5", "name": "Light blue dress shirt"}, {"id": "6", "name": "Charcoal wool trousers"}, {"id": "4", "name": "Black loafers"}], "missing_items": [{"description": "Brown leather belt", "max_price": 150}]}

{"date": "2025-10-08", "items": [{"id": "1", "name": "White button‑down shirt"}, {"id": "6", "name": "Charcoal wool trousers"}, {"id": "4", "name": "Black loafers"}], "missing_items": [{"description": "Light grey cardigan", "max_price": 150}]}
{"date": "2025-10-09", "items": [{"id": "5", "name": "Light blue dress shirt"}, {"id": "3", "name": "Grey chinos"}, {"id": "4", "name": "Black loafers"}], "missing_items": []}

{"date": "2025-10-10", "items": [{"id": "2", "name": "Navy blazer"}, {"id": "5", "name": "Light blue dress shirt"}, {"id": "3", "name": "Grey chinos"}, {"id": "4", "name": "Black loafers"}], "missing_items": [{"description": "Silk pocket square (emerald green)", "max_price": 150}]}
Here’s your weekly plan. I’ve also found purchase options for the missing pieces, all under $150 each.

arguments.query: brown leather belt men size M
emerald green silk pocket square men

messages.content: {"items": [{"title": "Cole Haan Brown Leather Belt", "price": 119.99, "url": "https://store.colehaan.com/brown-leather-belt"}, {"title": "Banana Republic Classic Leather Belt", "price": 89.50, "url": "https://bananarepublic.com/classic-belt"}]}"

{"items": [{"title": "Uniqlo Light Grey Cotton Cardigan", "price": 44.90, "url": "https://uniqlo.com/light-grey-cardigan"}, {"title": "J.Crew Soft Grey Cardigan", "price": 78.00, "url": "https://jcrew.com/soft-grey-cardigan"}]}"
